location.description: A peaceful escape just 1.5 hours from Dhaka, ideal for corporate, family, and friends' getaways. Surrounded by greenery with modern amenities.

accommodations.name: Heritage Cottage
accommodations.description: Dera Resort and Spa is located in the heart of the picturesque Manikganj district. We created this haven for nature lovers who want to escape the hustle and bustle of city life.

accommodations.name: Hub Cottage
accommodations.description: If you're looking for a bit of luxury in your vacation spot, consider checking out our Hub Cottage. This secluded getaway is perfect for couples or small groups who want to enjoy some privacy and relaxation.

accommodations.name: Superior Family Cottage
accommodations.description: Get a first-class family treatment and enjoy a great time with your loved ones. Our Superior Family Cottage pleases you with ultimate relaxation with a touch of nature without any feeling of leaving any member behind.

accommodations.name: Presidential Cottage
accommodations.description: The Presidential Cottage is perfect for those who want to enjoy the natural beauty of our resort while staying in an exclusive setting. This luxury cottage is perfect for those looking for a restful vacation at the resort.

accommodations.name: Golf view Cottages
accommodations.description: If you're looking for a place to relax and enjoy the great outdoors, look no further than our Golf View Cottage. This 10-room rental offers stunning views of the courses and is perfect for couples or small groups.

accommodations.name: VIP Cottages
accommodations.description: VIP cottage is our resortâ€™s newest and most luxurious accommodation. With its private pool and spa, this cottage offers a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

accommodations.name: Lakeside Cottages
accommodations.description: There are 7 lakeside cottages suitably built to enjoy both sunset and sunrise besides a vast lake.

hall.name: Shova Banquet Hall
hall.description: At our resort, we have a spacious banquet hall fitted with modern gazettes, amenities and decorations. Our banquet hall will surely make your next event a success.
